About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Eagle Scout

I have spent about eleven years in the Boy Scouts of America's Scouting program and can say without a doubt it has taught me many important life lessons and has given me experiences that I otherwise wouldn't of had.

Gamer

I am an avid PC gamer which is where I generally sink any extra free time and money I have. Its a hobby that keeps me thinking. I love the adventure aspect, leveling up, the stories that emerge, the world I help create, and the characters I grow to know.
